strapiPost.title: Fayetteville To Host First Spring Fling Farmer's Market Saturday
strapiPost.content:
The Fayetteville Farmers’ Market is having its first Spring Fling of the year this Saturday, March 19. 

  • Sun’s out, market’s out: The Spring Fling will be in the usual outdoor Farmers’ Market spot on the downtown Fayetteville square and will take place from 7a-2p. The next Spring Fling is scheduled for next Saturday, March 26.
  • If you can’t make it: Fayetteville’s Online Market is offered year-round for your convenience! You can make orders from 6a on Sundays to 6p on Wednesdays for Thursday evening pickups at the Fayetteville Library’s South Parking Lot. 

For updates on the Fayetteville Farmers’ Market, click HERE.
